text: â€˜Arau ma'i niscaya sihamtaka pathabhrasta karaima, arau arasye sihamtara hrdayata micha basanara srsti karaima, arau arasye ma'i sihamtaka nirdesa karaima phalata sihamte pasura kana phuta karaiba, arau arasye ma'i sihamtaka nirdesa karaima phalata sihamte allahara srsti bikrta karaibaâ€™. Allahara paraibarte konoba'i cayatanaka abhibharakaraupe grahana karaile si arasye spasta ksatigrasta haya
